overview: Real military guys experimenting.  Featuring: Marty, Bruce, Bryce 2, Ryan II, Nick It's a Bruce and Ryan party in "Bareback Base Camp 2!" Bruce tops for the first time (fucking Marty), while Bryce hooks up with Ryan for an oral scene. Then, Bruce pairs with Nick for another oral two-step. Rounding out the festivities is a solo with Ryan.
title: Bareback Base Camp 2
